faith in socialism, just like a mother's got faith in her child,

pa: You're the only one who's able to clean this place up

I'm sure of it.
 Goodbye to you.

A bit similar to Alfred.

pa: That's right, Albert.

pa: I remember. Of course.

wherever it may go.
